column1: '''Southern Star''' was a variety of pipe-weed grown in the [[Southfarthing]] of [[the Shire]], and apparently originating in the district around [[Longbottom]]. The 'star' of its name presumably refers to the star-shaped flowers of the [[pipe-weed]] plant.<ref>{{FR
In the second (out of seven) drafts of [[The Lord of the Rings Prologue]], "Southern Star" was originally named "Hornpipe Twist".<ref>{{PM
:The smoke from Southern Star Pipe-weed takes the form of two smoke rings that pass through each other as they float out from the pipe.
